meals.recipe: Cook oats with milk. Top with sliced banana and honey.
Mix greens, tomatoes, cucumbers with grilled chicken and vinaigrette.
Bake salmon fillet and serve with steamed quinoa and broccoli.
Top yogurt with fresh berries and a sprinkle of chia seeds.
Spread peanut butter on rice cakes, optionally add banana slices.
Mix tuna with light mayo, serve on whole grain bread with lettuce.
Stir-fry tofu with mixed vegetables and soy sauce over brown rice.
Toast whole grain bread, top with mashed avocado and poached egg.
Blend 1 scoop protein powder with almond milk and ice.
Grill chicken breast and serve with roasted sweet potato and spinach.
